landing.title: <colored>Halit</colored> is a <colored>product designer</colored> and <colored>full-stack developer</colored>
landing.description: His goal is to be useful to humanity with the projects he will invent by combining technology with creativity.

wordoftheday.quote: Strong minds discuss ideas, average minds discuss events, weak minds discuss people.
wordoftheday.author: Socrates

about-me.article: Hello there! My name is Halit and I enjoy creating things that make people’s lives easier. I have been dealing with computers since childhood and I continue this passion with my university education. My university education continues now. At the same time, I’m preparing for my new company, Unique Dot. I take pleasure in improving myself every day.I’m a software engineer specializing in building (and occasionally designing) exceptional digital experiences. Currently, I’m focused on building accessible, human-centered products.
about-me.follow-me: You can follow my videos about software development on my youtube channel:

contact.article: I’m interested in freelance opportunities. However, if you have other request or question, don’t hesitate to contact me
